achievement.name: Virtuoso
achievement.description: Unlock All Original Achievements

achievement.name: Stocked
achievement.description: Collect 150 Items

achievement.name: Far, Far Away...
achievement.description: Drive a total of 50 km

achievement.name: Super Victorious
achievement.description: Win a total of 30 games across any game mode

achievement.name: Champion
achievement.description: Win the Season Championship

achievement.name: The Streak
achievement.description: Win 10 games in a row across any mode

achievement.name: Helen's Pride
achievement.description: Score 6 Goals in a single game

achievement.name: Battle-Car Collector
achievement.description: Unlock all Battle-Cars

achievement.name: Drops in the Bucket
achievement.description: Collect 50 Items

achievement.name: Rocketeer
achievement.description: Complete the regular Season

achievement.name: Grease Monkey
achievement.description: Customize every slot on a single Battle-Car

achievement.name: Pitch Veteran
achievement.description: Play a total of 20 games across any game mode

achievement.name: Rider's Block
achievement.description: Make 20 Saves

achievement.name: Break Shot
achievement.description: Score a goal by hitting your opponent into the ball

achievement.name: Turbocharger
achievement.description: Use your Rocket Boost for a total of 5 minutes

achievement.name: Drill Sergeant
achievement.description: Complete every Practice Drill (any difficulty)

achievement.name: Minute to Win it
achievement.description: With only 60 seconds left, Win a game in which you were tied or trailing

achievement.name: Speed Demon
achievement.description: Completely fill and then empty your Rocket Boost 10 times in a single match

achievement.name: Pick-Me Up
achievement.description: Collect 5 Items

achievement.name: Wall-Crawler
achievement.description: Drive on the dome walls for a total of 5 minutes

achievement.name: Team Player
achievement.description: Play against every team in a Season

achievement.name: SARPBC Forever
achievement.description: Play with both classic Battle-Cars (Octane and Backfire)

achievement.name: Feather in Your Recap
achievement.description: Watch a save file in Replay mode

achievement.name: Winner
achievement.description: Win a total of 5 games across any mode

achievement.name: Clean Sheet
achievement.description: Win a game without giving up a single Goal

achievement.name: Triple Threat
achievement.description: Win a 3v3 game

achievement.name: Double Up
achievement.description: Win a 2v2 game

achievement.name: Singles Club
achievement.description: Win a 1v1 game

achievement.name: Perfect Start
achievement.description: Win your first game of the Season

achievement.name: Still A Show-Off
achievement.description: Score a goal while reversing

achievement.name: Know the Drill
achievement.description: Complete a Practice Drill

achievement.name: Traveler
achievement.description: Play in every Rocket LeagueÂ® stadium

achievement.name: Tinkerer
achievement.description: Customize one slot on a single Battle-Car

achievement.name: First-Timer
achievement.description: Score your first Goal

achievement.name: Barras Bravas
achievement.description: Play an Online game with a Friend

achievement.name: Friendly
achievement.description: Play an Exhibition match

achievement.name: An Inch and 6.2 Miles
achievement.description: Drive 10 km with either the Cristiano or Spinner Wheels

achievement.name: Ride or Die
achievement.description: Equip both Dominus and Takumi with a Supersonic Fury DLC Decal and Paint Finish, then win a game

achievement.name: Don't Look Back
achievement.description: Use the Burnout or Nitrous Rocket Boost for a total of 10 minutes

achievement.name: Family, Not Friends
achievement.description: Play a complete game with both Dominus and Takumi

achievement.name: Sky High
achievement.description: Score an Aerial Goal

achievement.name: All Fours
achievement.description: Win a 4v4 game

achievement.name: Gladiator
achievement.description: Play a game on Utopia Coliseum

achievement.name: Natural Progression
achievement.description: Win an Online Match with Scarab or Zippy

achievement.name: Throwback
achievement.description: Use the Accelerato Boost with an original Battle-Car while playing in a SARPBC-inspired arena

achievement.name: Hot Shot, Part Two
achievement.description: Win the MVP award using Scarab or Zippy

achievement.name: Icing the Cake
achievement.description: In Snow Day, score a goal from your own side of the ice

achievement.name: Budding Artist
achievement.description: Collect a Painted Item

achievement.name: One Better
achievement.description: Increase the level of a Certified Item

achievement.name: Certifiable
achievement.description: Earn Veteran status for your Certified Item

achievement.name: GG
achievement.description: Win the MVP award in a game that goes to overtime

achievement.name: Trifecta
achievement.description: Score a Goal, Save a shot, and Assist a teammate in a single game

achievement.name: Infinite Power!
achievement.description: Activate every power-up in Rocket LeagueÂ® Rumble

achievement.name: Stopped Cold
achievement.description: Freeze an opponent's shot before it can score

achievement.name: Rocket Genocider
achievement.description: Make 535 Shots on Goal

achievement.name: Registered Voter
achievement.description: Head to 'Arena Preferences' and use all of your votes

achievement.name: Brave the Elements
achievement.description: Complete a match on wasted land, under the sea, and in outer space

achievement.name: Damage Control
achievement.description: Win a Dropshot match via shutout

achievement.name: Full Course
achievement.description: Score a total of 18 Goals in Dropshot

achievement.name: Buckminster x10
achievement.description: Damage a total of 320 panels in Dropshot

achievement.name: Storm Trooper
achievement.description: Equip a Very Rare Item and complete a game in an Arena with turbulent weather

achievement.name: Good Times
achievement.description: Head to Champions Field and complete an Online game

achievement.name: Swap Meet
achievement.description: Trade and receive one or more items with another player in a single transaction

achievement.name: Trade Secret
achievement.description: Trade In five items of the same quality to receive an item of the next-highest quality

achievement.name: Rank Up
achievement.description: Complete all placement matches in any Competitive Playlist

achievement.name: Coming On Strong
achievement.description: Score or Assist a combined 30 goals or assists in Casual or Competitive Online matches

achievement.name: Join the Club!
achievement.description: Create or Join a Rocket League Club

achievement.name: Together is Better
achievement.description: Play and complete an Online match with one or more Clubmates

achievement.name: People Person
achievement.description: Play and complete 10 Online matches with one or more Clubmates

achievement.name: Squad Goals
achievement.description: Score a Goal while in a Club Match (Online Matchmaking only)

achievement.name: Winning is Winning
achievement.description: Win a Season Championship using Dominus or Takumi in every game

achievement.name: Drift King
achievement.description: Perform a 180 powerslide with both the Cristiano and Spinner Wheels

achievement.name: Survival of the Fittest
achievement.description: Equip the Shark Fin Topper and win an Unfair Bot Match

achievement.name: Heartbreaker
achievement.description: Win a game against All-Star Bots with the Hearts Decal equipped

achievement.name: My World is Fire
achievement.description: Equip any Chaos Run item and win a 4v4 Online match

achievement.name: Spectacular
achievement.description: With Grog, Score 10 Goals against Pro-level Bots or higher

achievement.name: Savage
achievement.description: With Ripper, Score 10 Goals against Pro-level Bots or higher

achievement.name: Ruthless
achievement.description: Make 50 total "Shots on Goal" using Grog or Ripper

achievement.name: Psycho-Master Exploder
achievement.description: Equip the Mohawk and Demolish 3 opposing Bots in the Wasteland

achievement.name: Mad Scientist
achievement.description: Play a complete match in 3 different Rocket Labs Arenas

achievement.name: Left Wing, Right Wing
achievement.description: Win a Snow Day match with both the Blue and Orange teams

achievement.name: Fast Break
achievement.description: Score at least 2 Dunks in the first minute of a Hoops game

achievement.name: Buzzer Beater
achievement.description: With 30 seconds left, win a game of Hoops in which you were tied or trailing

achievement.name: Sea Turtle
achievement.description: Head to AquaDome and score a goal while flipped on your back

achievement.name: Get Up, Mr. Bubbles!
achievement.description: Equip the Bubbles Rocket Trail and Score an Aerial goal, while playing in AquaDome

achievement.name: Metaverse
achievement.description: Equip the Halo Topper and win a match on Starbase ARC

achievement.name: New Challenger
achievement.description: Join and complete an Online Tournament match

achievement.name: Best of the Bunch
achievement.description: Earn the MVP award in any Online Tournament match
